Title: Damaged
Screenplay by:
Koji Steven Sakai 
 Gianni Capaldi 
 Paul Aniello
Produced by:
Paul Aniello 
 Gianni Capaldi 
 Roman Kopelevich
Starring:
Samuel L. Jackson 
 Vincent Cassel 
 Gianni Capaldi 
 Laura Haddock 
 John Hannah 
 Kate Dickie
Edited by:
Luis de la Madrid 
 Sean Albertson 
 Kurt Nishimura
Production companies:
Grindstone Entertainment Group 
 Red Sea Media 
 BondIt Media Capital 
 Tartan Bridge Films 
 High Five Films
Production: In March 2023, it was announced that filming began in Scotland. Filming wrapped in May 2023.
Release: Damaged was released in select theaters and on demand and digital on April 12, 2024.
Reception: On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 33% of 15 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 4.9/10.
